data.comment: The match is underway in Orlando.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Can Houston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Houston's half.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Houston at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Houston to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
In the minute 10, Houston's Darwin Quintero misses with an attempt on goal.
Victor Rivas awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Houston.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In Orlando Houston drive forward through Darwin Quintero. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 16, Free kick Houston.
Houston take a 0-1 lead thanks to Darwin Quintero.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston.
In the minute 22, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston.
Victor Rivas signals a Houston throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Houston have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.

Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.

Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 43, Houston are pushing forward but Memo Rodriguez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.

Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
In the minute 45, Houston have a goal kick.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 45, Houston pushes forward through Memo Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Houston's Kiki Struna has been booked in Orlando.
Victor Rivas has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mauro Manotas for Houston who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Houston have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Houston's Mauro Manotas looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Houston.
LA Galaxy's Ethan Zubak goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 52, Mauro Manotas is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mauro Manotas (Houston) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ronaldo Pena.

Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.

In the minute 70, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Boniek Garcia for Houston has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
Joe Corona is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Joe Corona returns to the field for LA Galaxy after picking up a slight injury.
Houston to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Boniek Garcia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.

In the minute 77, Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's third substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Diedie Traore replacing Emiliano Insua.
Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a second substitution, with Nico Lemoine replacing Niko Hansen.
Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a third change, with Tommy McNamara replacing the possibly injured Boniek Garcia.

The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for LA Galaxy.

Houston are caught offside.
In Orlando, Ronaldo Pena (Houston) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Tommy McNamara of Houston gets in a strike, but is off target.
Victor Rivas awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Sebastian Lletget gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Houston have a goal kick.
That's full-time at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. The final score is 1-1.
Cristian Pavon levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
